channel.title: CODE RED: Causing many see throughable items. How can i fix? (PAYING VIA PAYPAL)
channel.description:
CODE RED: Causing many see throughable items. How can i fix? (PAYING VIA PAYPAL)
COLOR 0 is invisible! Causing many see throughable items. How can i fix?
ModelColor = 0 I don't want to have to go in and change all of the items where this glitch takes place and change the model color 0 to 1... PLEASE SOMEONE HELP ME ON A WAY I CAN FIX THIS!
